101800.「オレの名は チャンプってんダ。\n さすらいの 野良スライムをやってたが\n:

101801.「よう <pc>！\n 一流の風格ってのが 染みついてきたナ！\n あんたが ど:

101802.「よう <pc>！\n 最高にホットな試合を 見せてくれテ\n いつも マジ サ:

<end>

101803.「よう 期待の超新星 <pc>！\n 最近 あんたが出てくる試合は\n 人気フッ:

popular that they're hard to watch!<end>

101804.「よう 元気そうだナ <pc>！\n みんな あんたのバトルの とりこサ。\n:
Hey, you look good<pc> Oh, my God. Everyone's talking about your

101805.「よう <pc>！\n あんた なかなかの好調ぶりだナッ！\n 今後の活躍 マジ:
Yo, <pc>! You're doing
pretty good! I'm really looking forward to

101806.「よう <pc>。\n あんた バッジ交換って 知ってるカ？\n<br>\n「そ:
Hey, . Do you know about the Badge Exchange?
There's this guy around here named the Badge Grandpa. He'll trade you new badges for your old ones! How generous!

101807.「オレの名は チャンプってんダ。\n こう見えて バトルロードの\n ランクアッ:

101808.「よう <pc>！\n 最強の まもの使い様の お出ましだナ！\n<br>\n「:

But don't let it get it to your head, got it? Goo don't want to stop here. That's what my instincts are telling me.
Reach the top of Monster Masterdom like no one else has before! If anyone can do it, goo can!

103801.「バトルロードの ランクアップ試験は\n 全部で ３回戦の勝ち抜きバトルだ！\n:
The Battle Roads Rank-Up Test is a three- round battle to win! Win or lose, you don't use your battle credits, so don't be shy
about giving it a try. And in the rank-up test, every time you win a battle, your HP is restored, but your MP is not. As usual, you
can't use your magic, and if you fight too hard, you won't be able to keep up.
